resources.string: Choose more suitable item in the list.\nThen press Found to mark the item as found
If you have an item with unknown sizes press Unknown to mark the item as unknown
If some size of the item differs from that indicated in the item by some amount, write the real size in this field
Press New screen to create a Chipboard Sheet List
Are you sure you want to delete\n%1$s (%2$s)?
Are you sure you want to edit\n%1$s (%2$s)?\n(The item will be deleted from the list)

Are you sure you want to select
%1$s (%2$s)?
to Find Area?
(The item will remain in the list)

Are you sure you want to remove
%1$s (%2$s)?
from Find Area?
(The item will remain in the list)

Are you sure you want to select
%1$s (%2$s)?
to Find Area?
(The item will be deleted from the list)

Are you sure you want to set
%1$s (%2$s)?
as not found yet?
(The item will remain in the list)
